mods.name: Respawn_OpenWorld
mods.author: Draguarius
mods.description: Respawn Open World Resources, Short radio SMPL3 don't work, delete this mod after respawn resources.
mods.long_description: Resources are restored at startup or in the immediate vicinity of the cave.
